## Row {height=60%}

```{r}
active_users_p +
  labs(title = switch(
    params$lang,
    ee = "Aktiivseid kasutajaid (nädalas)",
    en = "Active users (weekly)",
    ru = "Aктивные пользователи (в неделю)"
  ))
```


```{r}
symptoms_transl <- symptoms_lang %>%
  filter(lang == params$lang)
symptoms_p <- symptoms_transl %>%
  filter(!str_detect(label, "No symptoms")) %>%
  symptoms_p_fun() +
  scale_fill_manual(switch(
    params$lang,
    ee = "Viimased neli nädalat",
    en = "Last four weeks",
    ru = "Последние четыре недели"
  ), values = colors)
```


```{r}
nosymptoms_p <- symptoms_transl %>%
  filter(str_detect(label, "No symptoms")) %>%
  nosymptoms_p_fun() +
  labs(title = str_wrap(switch(
    params$lang,
    ee = "Sümptomiteta kasutajate osakaal",
    en = "Proportion of users with no symptoms",
    ru = "Доля пользователей без симптомов"
  ), width = 15))
```


```{r}
(symptoms_p + nosymptoms_p) + plot_layout(widths = c(0.8, 0.2))
```


## Row

```{r}
demographics_p +
  scale_y_discrete(switch(
    params$lang,
    ee = "Vanusegrupp",
    en = "Age group",
    ru = "Возрастная группа"
  )) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colors[3:4],
                    limits = rev,
                    labels = switch(
                      params$lang,
                      ee = c("Naised", "Mehed"),
                      en = c("Female", "Male"),
                      ru = c("Женщины", "Мужчины")
                    )) +
  labs(title = switch(
    params$lang,
    ee = "Valim",
    en = "Population",
    ru = "Выборка"
  ),
  caption = paste0(
    switch(
      params$lang,
      ee = "Sugu 'Muu': ",
      en = "Gender 'Other': ",
      ru = "Пол 'Другой': "
    ),
    others,
    " (",
    scales::percent(others / active_users_n),
    ")"
  ))
```
